VideoDoor 显示调整

by Air

December 6, 2014
in Old blogs

Migarated from here at ‘2016-07-08 18:28:43’.

  1. 修改显示区域大小：

   

VideoDoor_Avnet/packages/PRJ/trunk/mediastreamer2/src/h264dec/h264dec.c

static void dec_process(MSFilter *f) 函数中：

     

  RenderDisplay((void *)pict_ptr->planes,

d->toggle_flag, pict_ptr->w, pict_ptr->h, pict_ptr->w,

pict_ptr->h);

     

  修改最后两个参数（目标宽度，目标高度）

  1. 修改显示区域位置：

   

VideoDoor_Avnet/packages/PRJ/trunk/mediastreamer2/src/h264dec/fbvideo.c：

     

  int RenderDisplay(void* data, int toggle, int

Srcwidth, int Srcheight, int Tarwidth, int Tarheight)

     

  {

                

  …….

               

  //#define ENABLE_DISPLAY_HEIGHT_CENTER

     

  if (g_u32VpostHeight > Tarheight)

{  // Put image at the center of panel

         

  int offset_Y;

if defined(ENABLE_DISPLAY_HEIGHT_CENTER)

         

  offset_Y = (g_u32VpostHeight - Tarheight)/2 *

g_u32VpostWidth *

2;   

  // For RGB565

else

         

  offset_Y = 0;

endif

         

  vpe_setting.dest_addrPac = (unsigned int)pDstBuf

  • offset_Y;

     

  }

//#define ENABLE_DISPLAY_WIDTH_CENTER

     

  if ( g_u32VpostWidth > Tarwidth ) {

if defined(ENABLE_DISPLAY_WIDTH_CENTER)

             

  vpe_setting.dest_leftoffset =

(g_u32VpostWidth-Tarwidth)/2;

             

  vpe_setting.dest_rightoffset =

(g_u32VpostWidth-Tarwidth)/2;

else

             

  vpe_setting.dest_leftoffset = 0;

             

  vpe_setting.dest_rightoffset =

(g_u32VpostWidth-Tarwidth);

endif

     

  } else {

             

  vpe_setting.dest_width = g_u32VpostWidth;

             

  vpe_setting.dest_height =

g_u32VpostHeight;

             

  vpe_setting.dest_leftoffset = 0;

             

  vpe_setting.dest_rightoffset = 0;
